name: snarl
flavor_text: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
effect_text_simple: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
